TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataBinding extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含有关 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的单个数据绑定表达式的信息，这些信息可让快速应用程序开发 (RAD) 设计器（如 Microsoft Visual Studio）能够在设计时创建数据绑定表达式。

span.span: Contains information about a single data-binding expression in an ASP.NET server control, which allows rapid-application development (RAD) designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, to create data-binding expressions at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由的实例在设计时表示服务器控件中的每个数据绑定表达式类。Each data-binding expression in a server control is represented at design time by an instance of the class. 包含一个或多个数据绑定表达式的任何服务器控件已对象，其中包含对象。Any server control that contains one or more data-binding expressions has a object that contains the objects. 此集合是可通过访问类实现接口。This collection is accessible through the class implementing the interface. 创建自定义的 RAD 设计器，请使用该实现用于访问集合。When you create a custom RAD designer, use that implementation to access the collection. 任何或只能在设计时存在与服务器控件关联的对象。Any or objects associated with a server control exist only at design time. 它们在运行时不存在，因此，不能访问在运行时。They do not exist at run time and, therefore, are not accessible during run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建对象并设置等于在该控件的现有对象集合，它具有`propertyName`参数值为`Text`。The following code example creates a object and sets it equal to an existing object in the control's collection that has a `propertyName` parameter with a value of `Text`. 如果集合包含对象使用`propertyName`的值`Text`，此代码将返回的对象的值属性。If the collection contains a object with a `propertyName` value of `Text`, this code returns the value of the object's property. 如果没有此类对象，则返回空字符串 ("")。If there is no such object, it returns an empty string (""). [!code-csharp[DataBinding_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataBinding_Sample1/CS/databinding_samp1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataBinding_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataBinding_Sample1/VB/databinding_samp1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建对象并设置等于在该控件的现有对象集合，它具有`propertyName`参数值为`Text`。The following code example creates a object and sets it equal to an existing object in the control's collection that has a `propertyName` parameter with a value of `Text`. 如果集合包含对象使用`propertyName`的值`Text`，此代码将返回的对象的值属性。If the collection contains a object with a `propertyName` value of `Text`, this code returns the value of the object's property. 如果没有此类对象，则返回空字符串 ("")。If there is no such object, it returns an empty string (""). summary.span: 检索 对象的实例的哈希代码。

span.span: Retrieves the hash code for an instance of the object.

returns.span: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象都将置于对象，只能在设计时访问。 objects are placed in a object, accessible only at design time. 集合是一个哈希表，该表在控件上的绑定。The collection is a hash table that represents the bindings on a control. 只能有一个绑定每个属性，使代码计算哈希值匹配实现并且唯一所需的属性名称到帐户。There can only be one binding per property, so the hash code computation matches the implementation and only takes the property name into account.

summary.span: 获取要将数据绑定到的 ASP.NET 服务器控件属性的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the ASP.NET server control property to bind data to.
The property to bind data to.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例声明了三个变量`dataBindingOutput1`， `dataBindingOutput2`，并`dataBindingOutput3`，其的访问的不同属性对象， `myDataBinding2`。The following code example declares three variables, `dataBindingOutput1`, `dataBindingOutput2`, and `dataBindingOutput3`, which access the different properties of a object, `myDataBinding2`. 然后将分配的值属性设置为`dataBindingOutput1`，将其连接字符串"属性名称是"，并将值写入到文件。It then assigns the value of the property to `dataBindingOutput1`, concatenates it with the string "The property name is ", and writes the value to a file.
